attributes.action: Bring back the Nit Nurse to Schools
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition has been started because as parents we have had enough of spending loads of money on products that don't work and having our children go to and from school and constantly getting Nits back even after several treatments.

It's time the Nit Nurse was brought back to help us parents beat the bits that cause us an our children nuisance.
